text:
// Liam "Aphix_" Hawkes - Config File
// Last Updated - 22nd February 2018
// Resolution - 4:3 1024x768 [BlackBars] | 16:9 1920x1080


// Initial Settings
con_enable "1" // Ensures console is enabled on startup
cl_color "1" // Purple icon in-game (5v5)
cl_disablehtmlmotd "-1" // Disables in-game HTML Adverts
cl_forcepreload "1" // Pre-loads maps resulting in more consistent fps
mm_dedicated_search_maxping "50" // Will prioritize MM matches below 75 ping
cl_autowepswitch "0" // Will not switch to new weapon when picked up


// Crosshair Settings
Cl_Crosshair_Sniper_Width 2
alias "+smokeXhair" "cl_crosshairsize 450; cl_crosshairgap -5; cl_Crosshairdot 0; cl_Crosshair_drawoutline 0"
alias "-smokeXhair" "cl_crosshairsize 3; cl_crosshairgap -2; cl_Crosshairdot 0; cl_crosshair_drawoutline 1"
bind "TAB" "+smokeXhair"


// Mouse Settings
m_rawinput "1" // Ensures no acceleration is added by Windows
m_mouseaccel1 "0" 
m_mouseaccel2 "0" 


// Net Settings
fps_max "400" // Any higher than 400 is generally not worth it
fps_max_menu "165" // Set to monitor refresh rate
net_graph "1" // Enables net_graph to view fps and ping settings
net_graphproportionalfont "0" // Makes net_graph font extra small


// Rate Settings
rate "786432" // As of new net update, this is the highest value possible
cl_updaterate "128" // Best for 128 tick servers
cl_cmdrate "128" // Best for 128 tick servers
cl_interp "0"
cl_interp_ratio "1"
cl_lagcompensation "1"
cl_predictweapons "1"
cl_predict "1"


// Sound Settings
voice_scale "0.375" // In-game comms are set to 37.5% Volume
snd_musicvolume "0.2" 
snd_deathcamera_volume "0"
snd_mapobjective_volume "0"
snd_menumusic_volume "0"
snd_roundend_volume "0"
snd_roundstart_volume "0"
snd_tensecondwarning_volume "0.6"
snd_mixahead "0.02" // As of recent sound update, this is new default
snd_headphone_pan_exponent "2"
snd_headphone_pan_radial_weight "2"
snd_front_headphone_position "45"
snd_rear_headphone_position "135"


// Viewmodel Settings
viewmodel_fov 68.0 // Highest FOV Possible
viewmodel_offset_x 2.5
viewmodel_offset_y 1
viewmodel_offset_z -1.75
cl_righthand 1 // Right Handed Viewmodel
cl_bob_lower_amt 0
cl_bobamt_lat 0
cl_bobamt_vert 0
cl_viewmodel_shift_left_amt 0
cl_viewmodel_shift_right_amt 0
r_drawtracers_firstperson "0" 


// HUD Settings		
cl_hud_background_alpha "1"
cl_hud_bomb_under_radar "0"
cl_hud_healthammo_style "1"
cl_hud_playercount_pos "0"
cl_hud_playercount_showcount "0"
cl_hud_radar_scale "1.3"
hud_scaling "0.8"
hud_showtargetid "1"
cl_radar_always_centered "1"
cl_radar_icon_scale_min "1"
cl_radar_rotate "1"
cl_radar_scale "0.4"
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard "1"


// Buy Binds
bind "ALT" "Slot10" // Molotov
bind "4" "Slot9" // Decoy
bind "T" "Slot8" // Smoke
bind "F" "Slot7" // Flashbang
bind "G" "Slot6" // High Explosive

bind "home" "buy flashbang"
bind "end" "buy hegrenade"
bind "pgup" "buy ak47"
bind "pgdn" "buy vesthelm; buy defuser"
bind "ins" "buy molotov"
bind "del" "buy smokegrenade"

bind "kp_uparrow" "buy AWP"
bind "kp_leftarrow" "buy p250"
bind "kp_rightarrow" "buy tec9"
bind "kp_downarrow" "buy vest"
bind "kp_5" "buy flashbang; buy flashbang; buy smokegrenade; buy molotov"


// Scripts
// Clutch 
alias "clutch" "clutch_on"
alias "clutch_on" "voice_enable 0; net_graph 0; ignorerad; cl_radar_scale 0.65; r_cleardecals; cl_hud_radar_scale 1.3; unbind mouse4; say_team "VoiceOff";alias clutch "clutch_off""
alias "clutch_off" "voice_enable 1; net_graph 1; ignorerad; cl_radar_scale 0.40; r_cleardecals; cl_hud_radar_scale 1.2; bind mouse4 "+showscores"; say_team "VoiceOn"; alias clutch "clutch_on""
bind "F3" "clutch"

// Clearing Decals" 
bind "R" "+reload; r_cleardecals"
bind "SHIFT" "+speed; r_cleardecals"
bind "CTRL" "+duck; r_cleardecals"

// JumpThrow
alias "+jumpthrow" "+jump;-attack"
alias "-jumpthrow" "-jump"
bind "V" "+jumpthrow"


host_writeconfig
title: Aphix_.cfg
